pullRequest.title: JsonBuilder efficiency improvements
pullRequest.bodyText: Reuse the expensive Jackson factories in the JsonBuilder to reduce garbage. Provide an option to encode to a custom writer to allow writing directly to files in some cases for reasons of efficiency
